captions.text:
My love is hurt like cold 
Tears are bitter, catching love

I met a woman that makes my 
heart run,first time in 1000 years
Even from just looking

Your love let me cold heart 
Melt down bit by bit

My love is hurt like a cold 
Tears are bitter, catching love

My heart calls you,you
Like a scream

It hurts,hurts and hurts 
But I live because it’s you

My love is hurt as 
much as I loved you

In my head 
You linger all day

You came to be step by step 
And held it warmly

My love is hurt like a cold 
Tears are bitter, catching love

My heart calls you,you
Like a scream

It hurts,hurts and hurts 
But I live because it’s you

Do you see the love 
Filling up my heart
Can you heart it

It hurts more because 
you are not here

I lost love, and tears 
are falling like raindrops

My sob until my heart hurts 
But the reason I live is you

My love is hurt as 
much as I loved you

Even if it hurts this 
much I still love you

title: [MV] Lee Sang Gon(이상곤)(NOEL) _ My love is hurt(사랑이 아프다)(Kangchi, the Beginning(구가의서) OST Pt.2)
